title: Boris Johnson is cutting nurses' pay in real-terms after telling them 'we owe you more than words can say'
content:
1. Boris Johnson is cutting nurses' pay in real-terms after telling them 'we owe you more than words can say'  Business Insider
  2. Covid-19: Nurses prepare for strikes over 1% NHS pay rise in England  BBC News
  3. Swiss mull 'burqa ban' in vote centering on security, rights  Yahoo News
  4. Now we health workers know how empty Boris Johnson's 'clap for heroes' really was  The Guardian
  5. How many nurses' salaries does it take to redecorate Downing Street?  The Guardian
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 鲍里斯-约翰逊（Boris Johnson）在告诉护士 "我们欠你的比言语能说的更多 "之后，正在削减护士的实际工资。
鮑里斯-約翰遜（Boris Johnson）在告訴護士 "我們欠你的比言語能說的更多 "之後，正在削減護士的實際工資。
